roleset.name: go into detail
roleset.note: ELABORATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'elaborate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from elaborate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with subject
example.text: UAL wouldn't elaborate on a statement that it had been notified of the filing by Reliance.
example.arg: on a statement that it had been notified of the filing by Reliance

example.name: without subject
example.text: Reliance confirmed the filing but wouldn't elaborate.

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: From that point on, it is possible to follow the stages in his elaboration of a general theory of conflict.
example.arg: of a general theory of conflict
